original_text: Five of you will run after 100 of them. And 100 of you will run after 1,000 enemies. You will kill all your enemies.
korean_text: 또 너희 다섯이 백을 쫓고 너희 백이 만을 쫓으리니 너희 대적들이 너희 앞에서 칼에 엎드러질 것이며

sentences.original_text: Five of you will run after 100 of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 다섯 사람이 백 명을 쫓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And 100 of you will run after 1,000 enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 백 사람은 천 명을 쫓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will kill all your enemies.
